title: I can't join games. Help?
body: When I try to join a game it gives a server error.  Then it gives me a penalty for leaving.  My connection seems fine.  Any advice?

replies.body:
Your connection to other services and games may be fine, however, each one you access online resides in a different geolocation, therefore you may encounter issues to one service/game while not seeing issues to another. Our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) will walk you through configuring your local network settings for League, so I think that would be the best course of action right now.

If you still encounter issues with your ability to connect after taking those steps, let me know.
